color_primary_description: Primary colour for major navigational elements and buttons
color_primary_inverse_description: Text colour for elements where the primary colour is used
color_secondary_description: Secondary colour which can be used with various elements
color_secondary_inverse_description: Text colour for elements where the secondary colour is used
color_tertiary_description: Tertiary colour which can be used with various elements
color_tertiary_inverse_description: Text colour for elements where the tertiary colour is used
outline_color_description: Outline colour for the focus state of form fields
color_border_description: Border colour used for general elements
color_gray_200_description: The second lightest shade of grey
color_gray_300_description: The third lightest shade of grey
base_font_size_description: The base font size for body text
favicon_description: The icon displayed in the address bar of your browser
logo_height_description: The height of the logo image
tagline_description: The tagline to display beside the logo
border_radius_description: The border radius used throughout the theme
homepage_background_image_description: Hero image on the home page
community_background_image_description: Hero image on the community topics page
content_block_1_image_description: Image for the first category or section
content_block_2_image_description: Image for the second category or section
content_block_3_image_description: Image for the third category or section
content_block_4_image_description: Image for the fourth category or section
content_block_5_image_description: Image for the fifth category or section
content_block_6_image_description: Image for the sixth category or section
content_block_7_image_description: Image for the seventh category or section
content_block_8_image_description: Image for the eighth category or section
custom_block_1_image_description: Image for the first custom block
custom_block_2_image_description: Image for the second custom block
custom_block_3_image_description: Image for the third custom block
custom_block_4_image_description: Image for the fourth custom block
contact_block_1_image_description: Image for the first contact block
contact_block_2_image_description: Image for the second contact block
contact_block_3_image_description: Image for the third contact block
contact_block_4_image_description: Image for the fourth contact block
header_search_style_description: The style of search to display in the header on internal pages
scoped_knowledge_base_search_description: Search results are confined to the category the user is in
scoped_community_search_description: Search results are confined to the topic the user is in
search_placeholder_description: The placeholder text to display in search fields
search_translucent_description: Apply a translucent background colour to the search field on the Home page
show_search_button_description: Show a search button beside the search field on the Home page
header_layout_description: The layout of links within the header
fixed_header_description: Make the header float above hero elements
sticky_header_description: Make the header stick to the top of the page
nav_style_description: The layout of the mobile navigation menu
nav_breakpoint_description: The screen size at which the mobile menu should become a standard menu
full_width_header_description: Make the header content span the full width of the screen
header_height_description: The height of the page header
color_header_link_description: Colour for link elements in the standard page header
color_header_link_fixed_description: Colour for link elements in the page header when it's displayed above a hero element
bg_color_header_description: Background colour for the page header
header_link_1_text_description: The text to display for the first link
header_link_1_url_description: The URL of the first link
header_link_2_text_description: The text to display for the second link
header_link_2_url_description: The URL of the second link
header_link_3_text_description: The text to display for the third link
header_link_3_url_description: The URL of the third link
header_link_4_text_description: The text to display for the fourth link
header_link_4_url_description: The URL of the fourth link
show_submit_a_request_link_description: Show a Submit a Request link
category_dropdown_style_description: The style of category list to show in the header
notification_style_description: The style of notification to display
notification_location_description: The location in which to display the notification
notification_content_description: A reference to a dynamic content snippet containing the text or HTML content to display
color_notification_description: The colour for text within the notification
back_to_top_link_style_description: The style of Back to Top link to display
back_to_top_title_description: The accessibility title to use on the Back to Top link
boxed_layout_description: Display the page within a boxed layout
bg_color_boxed_description: Background colour visible when a boxed layout is used
hero_heading_description: The heading text to display within the hero element
color_hero_heading_description: Colour for headings in the hero element
hero_text_description: The text to display within the hero element
color_hero_text_description: Colour for text in the hero element
hero_image_style_description: The style to apply to the Home hero image
bg_color_hero_description: Primary background colour for the hero elements
bg_color_secondary_hero_description: Secondary background colour for the hero element
bg_gradient_hero_description: The type of background colour gradient to use
hero_content_alignment_description: The alignment of content within the hero element
hero_element_shape_description: The shape divider to use at the bottom of the hero element
popular_keywords_style_description: The style of popular keywords to display
popular_keywords_heading_description: The heading to display beside popular keywords
popular_keywords_description: The list of popular keywords to display, in a comma-separated list
promoted_videos_heading_description: The heading to display above the list of promoted videos
promoted_video_ids_description: A comma-separated list of YouTube or Vimeo video IDs to display
recent_activity_description: The style of recent activity to display
custom_block_style_description: The style of custom blocks to display on the Home page
color_custom_blocks_description: Colour palette used for custom blocks
bg_color_custom_blocks_description: Background colour for the custom blocks section
custom_blocks_heading_description: The heading to display above the custom block list
number_custom_blocks_description: The number of custom blocks to display on the Home page
number_custom_block_columns_description: The maximum number of columns to display per row
custom_block_alignment_description: The alignment of content within custom blocks
custom_block_image_height_description: The height of images within custom blocks

custom_block_1_description_description: The description of the first custom block

content_block_style_description: The style of content blocks to display on the Home page

content_blocks_heading_description: The heading to display above the content blocks
number_content_block_columns_description: The maximum number of columns to display per row
content_block_alignment_description: The alignment of content within content blocks
content_block_image_height_description: The height of content block images
article_list_style_description: The style of article lists to display in the Help Centre
article_list_columns_description: The maximum number of columns to display per row
article_list_excerpt_description: The length of excerpts to display for each article list item, if any
promoted_article_style_description: The style to use for promoted articles within general article lists
promoted_article_list_style_description: The style of promoted articles to display on the Home page
promoted_article_list_position_descripti: The position of the promoted articles list relative to the custom blocks and category lists
promoted_articles_heading_description: The heading to display above the promoted articles list
promoted_article_list_columns_descriptio: The maximum number of columns to display per row
promoted_article_list_alignment_descript: The alignment of content within the promoted articles list
promoted_article_list_excerpt_descriptio: The length of excerpts to display for each promoted article list item, if any
contact_block_style_description: The style of contact blocks to display on the Home page
color_contact_blocks_description: Colour palette used for contact blocks
contact_blocks_heading_description: The heading to display above the contact block list
number_contact_blocks_description: The number of contact blocks to display on the Home page
number_contact_block_columns_description: The maximum number of columns to display per row
contact_block_image_height_description: The height of images within contact blocks

contact_block_1_description_description: The description of the first contact block

cta_style_description: The style of CTA to display
cta_location_description: The page(s) on which to show the CTA
cta_element_heading_description: The heading to display within the CTA
color_heading_cta_description: Colour for headings within the CTA
cta_element_body_description: The text to display within the CTA
color_text_cta_description: Colour for text elements within the CTA
cta_element_link_text_description: The link text to display within the CTA
subsection_style_description: The style of subsection list to display in the main content area
category_heading_alignment_description: The alignment of the category header
category_sidebar_description: The type of navigation element to display within the category sidebar
section_heading_alignment_description: The alignment of the section page header
follow_section_description: Users can follow a specific section
section_sidebar_description: The type of navigation element to display within the section sidebar
article_metadata_description: The type of article metadata to display
follow_article_description: Users can follow a specific article
table_of_contents_style_description: The style of Table of Contents to display on articles with two or more headings
table_of_contents_heading_description: The heading to display above the Table of Contents links
article_navigation_style_description: The style of links to display for the previous and next articles
previous_article_title_description: The title to display above the previous article navigation link
next_article_title_description: The title to display above the next article navigation link
show_article_voting_description: Users can vote on an article
article_sharing_description: Show social media sharing on article
share_title_description: Title to display alongside social media sharing links
article_sidebar_description: The type of navigation element to display within the article sidebar
articles_in_section_description: Show sidebar of articles in section
note_title_description: The title to display within note content elements
warning_title_description: The title to display within warning content elements
enable_lightboxes_description: Enable lightbox functionality throughout the Help Centre
enable_video_player_description: Enable our custom video player for YouTube, Vimeo and MP4 videos
community_image_style_description: The style to apply to the Community hero image
show_recent_activity_community_descripti: Show recent activity in the Community
follow_topic_description: Users can follow a specific topic
follow_post_description: Users can follow a specific post
post_sharing_description: Show social media sharing on post
show_new_post_callout_description: Show a callout within the page sidebar allowing visitors to create a new post
form_list_style_description: The layout style of the form selection list when two or more forms are available
form_tip_description: Helpful information to display to visitors at the top of the request form
footer_layout_description: The layout to use for the page footer
footer_shape_description: The shape divider to use at the top of the footer
color_footer_link_description: Colour for link elements in the page footer
bg_color_footer_description: Background colour for the page footer
footer_link_1_text_description: The text to display for the first footer link
footer_link_1_url_description: The URL of the first footer link
footer_link_2_text_description: The text to display for the second footer link
footer_link_2_url_description: The URL of the second footer link
footer_link_3_text_description: The text to display for the third footer link
footer_link_3_url_description: The URL of the third footer link
footer_link_4_text_description: The text to display for the fourth footer link
footer_link_4_url_description: The URL of the fourth footer link
show_social_links_description: Show links to your social media pages
facebook_link_description: The URL of your Facebook page
twitter_link_description: The URL of your Twitter/X page
linkedin_link_description: The URL of your LinkedIn page
instagram_link_description: The URL of your Instagram page
pinterest_link_description: The URL of your Pinterest page
youtube_link_description: The URL of your YouTube page
show_credit_link_description: An optional and greatly appreciated link to the designer's website
use_translations_description: Use dynamic content references instead of static text within theme settings
language_selector_location_description: The location in which to show a language selector with a list of supported languages
show_category_heading_description: Display the parent category heading at the top of Section and Articles pages
show_mobile_user_dropdown_description: Show user related links within a dropdown menu on mobile devices
category_list_image_image_description: Image to display in the category list heading
promoted_article_list_image_description: Image to display in the promoted article list heading
enable_automatic_lightboxes_description: Automatically display all images within article content in lightboxes
section_list_heading_description: The heading text to display above each section list
show_category_heading_image_description: Show an image beside the category list heading
show_promoted_heading_image_description: Show an image beside the promoted articles heading
video_library_layout_description: The layout to use with the optional Video Library
video_library_heading_description: The heading to display above the Video Library
play_videos_inline_description: Enable to play videos inline instead of within a lightbox
video_ids_description: A comma-separated list of YouTube video IDs to display in the Video Library
home_page_content_description: The content to display on the Home page
general_sidebar_description: The type of navigation element to display within the sidebar
articles_by_label_heading_description: The heading text to display above the list of articles
article_label_filter_description: The label(s) of the articles that you would like to show, in a comma-separated list
article_background_image_description: Background image for the promoted articles list on the Home page
promoted_article_image_height_descriptio: The height of each promoted article image
sections_text_description: The text to use when describing how many sections exist within a category or section
read_more_link_text_description: The text to use with the 'Read More' link
read_more_text_description: The Read More button label to display when excerpts are used with the Toggles list style
back_link_text_description: The text to use with the 'Back to' link
